reviews.text: Unfortunately southern use this station. So don't expect much. Customer service all round could be improved. But always seems cleaning and tidy
Sutton station is only rail station one line. There are some good stores around it. It is nice and full of people.

Runs southern rail so not sure you can ever expect much, but not the station's fault. There are quite a few steps here but I believe there is a lift if you need it, but not certain on that, is not obviously placed if there is

Recent events regarding the homeless person and water aside, this isn't a good station mainly due to the appalling service from both the train service and the customer service provided by Southern. It's easier to dodge rain then find a day when a Thameslink or Southern service isn't cancelled or 15 minutes late. 

The facilities are decent enough with lifts down to the platforms, toilets, ticket office and shops. But still, the overall service ruins it.
